projects.name: Freck Beauty
projects.description: Using customer data provided by our eCommerce platform and Google Analytics, I collaborated with Freck's Brand Director to improve the UX design of Freck's eCommerce app and build mobile-friendly wireframes. After many iterations and prototypes, from integrating a React front-end framework, which connected to the WooCommerce REST API, to finally migrating Freck's eCommerce platform from WooCommerce to Shopify in order to take advantage of their Liquid codebase, allowing a more seamless integration of AJAX and JavaScript. The result: a faster website, quicker checkout experience, happier users, and more sales.

projects.name: Movement to End Violence
projects.description: Using Trello to manage the project, worked on a cross-functional team with a program manager, co-director, and consultants to build an accessible and dynamic application form in both English and Spanish.

projects.name: Babes in the Biz
projects.description: Working with Softcore Studio's brand guidlines, I built a static website for a remote client to showcase their services and allow potential clients to connect with them via contact forms and an embedded third-party scheduling app.

projects.name: Burst Book
projects.description: An eCommerce app that allows its users to upload multiple images and create a custom flip book for purchase.

projects.name: Simon
projects.description: I built a classic memory game with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for my Web Development Immersive with General Assembly.
